subject: Steroids
Human Growth Hormone
Athletics and Sports
Friendship
lead_paragraph: Mike Wallace, 89, will interview Roger Clemens about his link to steroids and human growth hormone for a segment of CBS’s “60 Minutes” that is scheduled to be broadcast Jan. 6.
snippet: Mike Wallace, 89, will interview Roger Clemens about his link to steroids and human growth hormone for a segment of CBS’s “60 Minutes” that is scheduled to be broadcast Jan. 6.
